mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NAME, DISAB FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = #{codeMasterId}

SELECT USER_NAME FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_NAME = #{userId} AND
ROWNUM <= 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL0148M( AGENT_ID, AGENT_GRP_ID, AGENT_TYPE, AGENT_NAME, STUS_ID, USER_ID, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES( #{agentSeq}, #{agentGrpId}, #{agentType}, #{agentName}, #{stusId}, #{userId}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE SAL0148M SET AGENT_TYPE = #{agentType}, AGENT_GRP_ID = #{agentGrpId}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName}, STUS_ID = #{stusId}, USER_ID = #{userId}, UPD_USER_ID = #{crtUserId}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AGENT_ID = #{agentId}
mapper.select:
SELECT USER_ID FROM SAL0148M WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND
ROWNUM <= 1
mapper.update:
UPDATE SAL0149D SET UPD_USER_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE,
AGENT_ID = #{updateField}, PREV_AGENT_ID = #{prevAgentId}, UPD_AGENT_DT = SYSDATE,
ETR_FG = #{updateField},
SENSITIVE_FG = #{updateField},
REM = #{rem} WHERE SALES_ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId}

UPDATE SAL0149D SET REM = #{remark}, ETR_REM = #{remark2}, AGENT_ID = #{rosCaller2}, PREV_AGENT_ID = #{prevAgentGrpId}, AGENT_GRP_ID = #{rosCaller2}, PREV_AGENT_GRP_ID = #{prevAgentGrpId}, UPD_AGENT_DT = SYSDATE, SENSITIVE_FG = #{sensitiveFg}, ETR_FG = #{etrFg}, UPD_USER_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SALES_ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId}
UPDATE SAL0029D SET CORP_TYPE_ID = #{corpTypeId}, UPD_USER_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(-1) cnt FROM SAL0149D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 WHERE B.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo}
SELECT COUNT(-1) CNT FROM SAL0148M A JOIN SYS0013M B ON A.AGENT_TYPE = B.CODE_ID AND B.CODE_MASTER_ID = 329 AND DISAB = 0 WHERE A.AGENT_GRP_ID = #{updateField}

SELECT A.SALES_ORD_ID, A.AGENT_ID, A.AGENT_GRP_ID, A.REM, A.SENSITIVE_FG, A.ETR_FG, A.ETR_REM, A.CUST_ID, B.SALES_ORD_NO FROM SAL0149D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 WHERE B.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo}
SELECT ROS_YEAR || '/' || ROS_MONTH ROS_DT , CASE WHEN ROS_CALLER_USER_ID = 0 THEN null ELSE ROS_CALLER_USER_ID END ROS_CALLER_USER_ID FROM MSC0013D WHERE SALES_ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId}
SELECT COUNT(CUST_ID) CNT,AGENT_GRP_ID FROM SAL0149D WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} AND AGENT_GRP_ID != 0 GROUP BY CUST_ID,AGENT_GRP_ID

SELECT EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID as SALES_ORD_ID, EXTENT1.ORD_NO, EXTENT1.AGENT_ID, EXTENT1.AGENT_GRP_ID, EXTENT1.REN_STUS, EXTENT1.ITM, EXTENT1.REM, CASE WHEN EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 4 ELSE 21 END STUS_ID, CASE WHEN EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'VALID' ELSE 'INVALID' END STUS_CODE FROM SAL0241T EXTENT1 LEFT JOIN SAL0001D EXTENT2 ON EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_NO = EXTENT1.ORD_NO
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SAL0241T (ORD_NO,AGENT_ID,AGENT_GRP_ID, REN_STUS,ITM,REM)
(SELECT #{item.ordNo} as ORD_NO, #{item.agentId} as AGENT_ID, #{item.agentGrpId} as AGENT_GRP_ID, #{item.renStus} as REN_STUS, #{item.itm} as ITM, #{item.rem} as REM FROM DUAL)

INSERT INTO SAL0239D( RC_BATCH_ID , RC_BATCH_NO , RC_STUS_ID , RC_TYPE_ID , RC_CRT_USER_ID , RC_CRT_DT , RC_UPD_USER_ID , RC_UPD_DT, AGENT_TYP_UPL_ID ) VALUES( #{rcBatchNo}, #{rcBatchNo}, #{stusId}, #{rcmsUploadType}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{assignUploadType} )

INSERT INTO SAL0240D (RC_ITM_ID ,RC_BATCH_ID ,RC_ITM_ORD_ID ,RC_ITM_STUS_ID ,RC_ITM_FIELD ,RC_ITM_REM ,RC_ITM_CRT_USER_ID ,RC_ITM_CRT_DT ,RC_ITM_UPD_USER_ID ,RC_ITM_UPD_DT ,RC_ITM_CNVR_STUS_ID,RC_ITM_CNVR_REM,RC_ITM_AGENT_ID,RC_ITM_AGENT_GRP_ID,RC_ITM_REN_STUS)
SELECT SAL0240D_RC_ITM_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{seq} ,EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID ,CASE WHEN EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 4 ELSE 21 END,EXTENT1.ITM ,EXTENT1.REM ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE , 1 ,null,EXTENT1.AGENT_ID,EXTENT1.AGENT_GRP_ID,EXTENT1.REN_STUS FROM SAL0241T EXTENT1 LEFT JOIN SAL0001D EXTENT2 ON EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_NO = EXTENT1.ORD_NO
